p: Three Generalized linear models (GLMs) used in this study: Poisson, negative binomial, and quasi-likelihood regression, allow data that are not in a normal distribution and nonnegative integers. They are commonly used in epidemiology or biostatistical research [ 16, 18, 19, 21, 23, 25, 26, 29, 30, 32]. Excess zero counts, which cause overdispersion of the data, are allowed in these three methods.
